articles.title: NUSS to scrap segregation of toilets at sports facilities by vaccination status - AsiaOne

articles.title: Pinoy 'Miss Saigon' alumnus gets mugged in New York, suspect makes anti-Asian remark - GMA News Online

articles.content:
